name: Haunt Monster
description:
ADD TO WISHLIST

MULTIPLAYER


Haunt Monster is a 1-4 player co-op survival horror multiplayer FPS zombies game set in a random generated environment. Build, defend and survive waves of zombies, monsters and aliens. Play solo or co-op with friends to survival.

BUILD

Make money, build bases to protect the army camp. Build machines such as: Assault Machine, Bomb Machine, Medical Machine. Buy weapons and defend against attacks from zombies, monsters and aliens.

RANDOM LEVELS

Explore various randomly generated environmental infected areas: forest, desert, arctic. Cooperate with friends and shoot various zombies, monsters and aliens.

SURVIVE

Protect, survive and buy new weapons to defend against attacks from zombies, monsters and aliens. Build more fences, traps, robots with friends to strengthen your defense. The battle has begun and they are coming.

Features:
  • Play alone or with up to 4 players
  • Build machines to survive
  • Randomly generated environmental
  • New zombies, monsters and aliens
  • New maps to explore

SINGLEPLAYER


Haunt Monster is third person shooting monster game. Your mission is shoot the monsters that have been mutated. From the offices, warehouses, tunnel and mysterious laboratories have become hiding places for monsters, zombies, aliens. They are coming, haunting and destroying the city.

FEATURES

Weapons: Over 15 weapons & items allow you to defeat with the monsters.

Monsters: Shoot types of monsters, zombies, aliens. Through abandoned factories, police stations and research stations to eliminate them.

Trade, customize stats, interact: Buy, sell weapons and equipment with NPCs. Upgrade the character skills according to the player choice.

Quick Overview:
+ 10 maps to explore. 3 minigame procedural generation dungeon
+ 15+ Weapons
+ Shoot monsters, zombies and aliens
